path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Iosiro/Synthetix Aspidiske Release Smart Contract Audit _ iosiro.md

findings.title: Potential issues for accounts with a Synthetix Escrow balance
findings.description: The implementation neglects that a user could have SNX in the SynthetixEscrow contributing to their c-ratio. When paying out liquidator rewards, the transaction could fail, as the necessary amount of SNX is not liquid.

findings.title: Overcorrection for self-liquidations
findings.description: Using `balanceOf` instead of the `_collateral` function results in self-liquidations overcorrecting if there are escrowed entries.
